data.prayer: Father, convict the 55,414 believers in Tatarstan to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tatarstan, Russia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 3,786,500 people living in Tatarstan through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next hour in Tatarstan, Russia.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Father, bless the state of Tatarstan with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Tatarstan. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Tatar people might believe through him.
Father, bring yourself glory in Tatarstan. Through your servants plant 757 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Tatarstan, Russia a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Tatarstan, Russia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

location.name: Tatarstan
location.cities_list: Kazan, Naberezhnyye Chelny, Nizhnekamsk, Al’met’yevsk, Zelenodolsk
location.cities_list_w_pop: Kazan (1,104,738), Naberezhnyye Chelny (509,870), Nizhnekamsk (234,297), Al’met’yevsk (140,437), Zelenodolsk (99,600)
